rules.description: Cmd+PgUp ↦ Ctrl+PgUp: Move to previous tab
Fn+Cmd+Up ↦ Ctrl+PgUp: Move to previous tab
Cmd+PgDn ↦ Ctrl+PgDn: Move to next tab
Fn+Cmd+Down ↦ Ctrl+PgDn: Move to next tab
desktop≡0 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Right ↦ {desktop≔1, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+1}: Moves/Window to Desktop 1 (top-left screen on 3×3 grid)
desktop≡0 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Left ↦ {desktop≔9, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+9}: Moves/Window to Desktop 9 (bottom-right screen on 3×3 grid)
Cmd+Opt+KP0 ↦ {desktop≔0, Cmd+Opt+9, Cmd+Opt+Right}: Moves/Window to Full-Screened Window
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP7 ↦ {desktop≔1, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+1}: Moves/Window to Desktop 1 (top-left screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP8 ↦ {desktop≔2, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+2}: Moves/Window to Desktop 2 (top-center screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP9 ↦ {desktop≔3, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+3}: Moves/Window to Desktop 3 (top-right screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP4 ↦ {desktop≔4, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+4}: Moves/Window to Desktop 4 (middle-left screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP5 ↦ {desktop≔5, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+5}: Moves/Window to Desktop 5 (middle-center screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP6 ↦ {desktop≔6, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+6}: Moves/Window to Desktop 6 (middle-right screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP1 ↦ {desktop≔7, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+7}: Moves/Window to Desktop 7 (bottom-left screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP2 ↦ {desktop≔8, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+8}: Moves/Window to Desktop 8 (bottom-center screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP3 ↦ {desktop≔9, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+9}: Moves/Window to Desktop 9 (bottom-right screen on 3×3 grid)

Shift?+Cmd+Opt+9 ↦ {desktop≔9, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+9}: Moves/Window to Desktop 9 (bottom-right screen on 3×3 grid)

Shift+F15 ↦ ⇧
Cmd+F15 ↦ ⌘
Ctrl+F15 ↦ ⌃
Opt+F15 ↦ ⌥
Cmd+Opt+PgUp ↦ Shift+Cmd+Tab: Move to previous application
Cmd+Opt+PgDn ↦ Cmd+Tab: Move to next application
Shift?+Cmd+Home ↦ Shift?+Cmd+Up: Move/Select to document start
Shift?+Cmd+End ↦ Shift?+Cmd+Down: Move/Select to document end
Cmd+Opt+Insert ↦ Ctrl+Cmd+q: Lock screen
Shift+Opt+Insert ↦ Shift+Cmd+q: Log out
Cmd+Opt+Delete ↦ Ctrl+Cmd+Opt+Eject: Shutdown
Shift+Cmd+Opt+Delete ↦ Ctrl+Cmd+Opt+Eject: Reboot
Del ↦ Cmd+Opt+Fn+Bksp: Delete file
Shift?+Home ↦ Shift?+Cmd+Left: Move/Select to line start
Shift?+End ↦ Shift?+Cmd+Right: Move/Select to line end
Shift+Cmd+Backspace ↦ Cmd+Delete: Delete to line start
Shift+Cmd+Delete ↦ Ctrl+k: Delete to line end
Shift?+Opt+Left ↦ Opt+F14: Move to previous or leftward pane
Shift?+Opt+Up ↦ Opt+F18: Move to previous or upward pane
Shift?+Opt+Right ↦ Shift?+Opt+F16: Move/Split to next or rightward pane
Shift?+Opt+Down ↦ Shift?+Opt+F12: Move/Split to next or downward pane
Shift?+Cmd+Up ↦ Shift?+Opt+Up: Move/Select to paragraph start
Shift?+Cmd+Down ↦ Shift?+Opt+Down: Move/Select to paragraph end
Ctrl+PgUp ↦ Shift+Cmd+`: Move to previous window
Ctrl+PgDn ↦ Cmd+`: Move to next window
Shift?+Cmd+Left ↦ Shift?+Opt+Left: Move/Select to word start
Shift?+Cmd+Right ↦ Shift?+Opt+Right: Move/Select to word end
Cmd+Bksp ↦ Opt+Bksp: Delete to word start
Cmd+Del ↦ Opt+Fn+Bksp: Delete to word end
